snippet: The attack on a cargo ship near Tobruk, which killed an officer, was the latest episode of violence among armed factions within Libya spiraling out.

byline.contributor: Ceylan Yeginsu contributed reporting from Soma, Turkey.

lead_paragraph: The attack on a cargo ship near Tobruk, which killed an officer, was the latest episode of violence among armed factions within Libya spiraling out.

headline.main: Turkish Cargo Ship Attacked Off Libyan Coast
